post.body: Why is it that the expensive breakfast places make crap coffee, when even truckstops can get it right?
Going to be 80degrees today and 40degrees tomorrow. LOL. Everyone is going to be sick
Driving to Dallas now. What was I thinking?
well added a picture. now people will flock to read my twitter.....lol
Getting this daily thing down. 4 days until I am revered and get my new pet. WOOT
Doing lunch at my daughters school today. Having flashbacks of tattertott fights!
Song was:shave and a haircut two bits, now it's $20bucks. Oh for the old days
The iPhone battery life sucks! And the dropped calls suck even more. 3G. Ya whatever!
Going to get my hair cut. Its way past time
Texas now requires emissions testing..... Back to the shop? Can't believe I have to get in the DoT line again
http://twitpic.com/tbn0 - Going to the DoT to register my toy
reporter throws a shoe a Pres. Bush in Iraq... Secret Service quoted as saying: "we only dive in front of bullets"
Has anyone noticed walmart has taken over the world?
Almost done with the Christmas shopping. Thank god!
Texas is living up to it's rep... Weather has changed 3 times since I got up
Sometimes it would be easier if you could just reset the clock!
First they rape you on the cost of repair, then follow it up with "we can't get to it for a week".
Can't believe mechanics are making $70. Per hour. Why didn't I stay in autoshop?
As much as I hate those bells ringing outside the stores. I admire that the people have conviction to help others
What happened to 2008? It looked so promising. Now every thing I read is doom
Well travel is over and work begins
Work up to my blizzard Xmas gifts. Got a helper. Every new pet helps â˜º
http://twitpic.com/wd29 - Bigblue getting new toys. Now with roofrack
Last minute shopping is nuts. Why do I do it every year?
34degrees and raining. God I love Texas weather
Figures. Have to wait for the last xp. It a update day. :(
Only 540xp to go to exalted with Kalu'ak. So tomorrow is the day.
Picking up bigblue in 2 hours. Can't wait to see how she looks
Two days to exalted and my new pet. Woot
Up at 4am and ready to work. Something is wrong with me
Well it's time to knock out some of the daily routine.
